title: AutofillSettings
description: Delivered as part of Runtime Configuration, but needs to live here since Runtime Configuration can contain settings for many features

featureToggles.title: AutofillFeatureToggles
featureToggles.description: These are toggles used throughout the application to enable/disable features fully

unknown_username_categorization.description: If true, we will attempt re-categorizing username, based on the rest of the input fields in the form

input_focus_api.description: If true, we will send extra calls (getAutofillDataFocused) to show the keyboard accessory

password_variant_categorization.description: If true, we will attempt re-categorizing the password variant, based on other fields in the form

partial_form_saves.description: If true, then username only form saves will be allowed
